remarks: The argument of the aleph function is less than or equal to its value. Exercise 2 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 91.  (Later, in ~ alephfp2 , we will that equality can sometimes hold.)  (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2003.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2013.)
statement: alephle $p |- ( A e. On -> A C_ ( aleph ` A ) ) $.
